MajorClaims.MC1: This, contrary to some ideas, is a positive progress in human society
MajorClaims.MC2: in a society where females are given equal opportunities compared with males would obviously enjoy lots of benefits far outweighing its obstacles

Claims.C1: Women nowadays are much more active, they may be successful businessmen, they join the political world, they become scientists and so on
Claims.C2: the revolution in females' right has brought about many benefits not only to themselves but society as well
Claims.C3: such changes do lead to some negative results like an upward trend in divorce rate

Premises.P1: the "weaker" gender as often be thought has enough right as well as ability to contribute to the development of human beings just like any other men, not to mention they even perform better in some fields
Premises.P2: Gone are the days when women could do nothing rather than stick to boring house work and take care of children
Premises.P3: the fairness between males and females is inevitable in such a developed society
Premises.P4: The financial burden of families, for instance, has decreased significantly with both the wives and the husbands working to earn money
Premises.P5: women have the outstanding instinct to take up some careers like healthcare or human resource management due to their patience and elaboration
Premises.P6: women find it difficult to balance their work and their traditional role as the wives
Premises.P7: children might enjoy less care from parents as they are both busy with their work
